summary: Doug and his pal Skeeter set out to find the monster of Lucky Duck Lake.
cast: Thomas McHugh|Fred Newman|Chris Phillips|Constance Shulman|Frank Welker|Doug Preis|Guy Hadley|Alice Playten|Eddie Korbich|David O'Brien|Doris Belack|Becca Lish|Bob Bottone|Greg Lee|Bruce Bayley Johnson|Fran Brill|Melissa Greenspan|Patrick Pinney
title: Doug, su 1ª película
